1.content:
If anyone asked him, Jaune Arc would deny all accusations that he squealed like a little girl. Seriously, he did not make such undignified sounds, no matter how much people insisted. Especially a certain blonde pun-terror!

But for this one time, he allowed himself to cheer with no restraint.

The blonde swordsman and hunter-in-training was outside of Beacon, using a secluded spot near the Emerald Forest as a private training ground. Pyrrha and he would either us this one or the roof of the dorms whenever they trained together. However, this time the redhead was nowhere to be seen.

Anyway, Jaune had finally discovered his semblance! The blonde teen was beyond ecstatic. Many people had speculated about what it could be; Ruby thought it would be flashy, Nora thought it would be heroic, and Yang thought it would explain his bad luck.

Okay, maybe that last one was more mockery than speculation... but still!

None of their friends had guessed correctly though. To be fair, neither he had expected it to turn out like this. It wasn't anything that enhanced himself, like Ruby's speed and Yang's super-saiyan semblance, nor could it be used offensively or defensively.

Jaune had to admit that it was a bit humiliating that his semblance couldn't be used on himself, seeing as it actually enhanced others; girls to be exact.

The blonde knight had discovered his semblance earlier in team JNPR's shared room. Their team could be a bit chaotic in the morning, and that often resulted into bumping against each other. Being the clumsy dork that he was, Jaune had accidentally stumbled into Pyrrha.

For some reason she didn't seem to mind it all that much... probably because she was such a great and understanding partner. Certainly not anything else.

But what had stuck out to him was that making contact with her while using his semblance had changed her. Now, everyone knew that Pyrrha was a fit girl; it was to be expected from such a renowned fighter, who worked out regularly to stay in shape. That meant that she had some muscle definition -- though not overly so.

Whatever his semblance was called, changed that. It had been very subtle, but Jaune had noticed how her muscles had grown a little, becoming more defined and gaining a tiny amount of size.

No one had said anything about it; not even Pyrrha herself. Not that surprising, seeing as Jaune wouldn't have seen it either without the close contact. However, it had made him think and consider the consequences.

A small test later on at their table during breakfast with their sister team -- team RWBY, of course -- had confirmed his suspicions. While handing over another stack of pancakes to a hungry Nora, he had briefly made physical contact with her, with his semblance activated.

Once again one of his teammates had grown a bit more muscular. It didn't work on men though, as he had tried it out on Ren without any results. Jaune should be disappointed that his semblance turned out to be like that, but the blonde swordsman was feeling anything but down.

It helped that he absolutely loved muscular women.

Jaune wouldn't freely admit it unless he was completely wasted, but muscular girls turned him on immensely. He often glanced at Yang and Pyrrha when they didn't look, gazing at the defined muscles on both the blonde brawler and red-haired spartan.

And with this semblance? He could finally make his fantasies come true!

"Oh, I am so going to enjoy this!" Jaune grinned excitedly as he thought about all of the girls he could use his semblance on.

But who would be first?

111.content:
Jaune arrived at the dorms, heading straight for his shared room to recollect his thoughts. He'd need to think carefully about what to do next. There were many girls he could use his semblance on, but maybe someone close to him would be the best option, since physical contact was the only way he knew how to use it.

"Maybe Pyrrha? No, she's training right now... Maybe Nora? Oh, wait, Ren took her to the cafeteria for pancakes..." Jaune muttered to himself as he narrowed his eyes at the floor. He walked without really watching his surroundings, "Ugh, who should I pick?"

The only people who would be suitable would be his friends from team RWBY. Hell, he'd be lying if he denied having thought of Yang with huge biceps. Or Blake with massive muscular thighs. Or even Weiss with a wide, sinewy back. There was also-

"Hi, Jaune!"

The blonde knight almost jumped out of his skin as Ruby appeared in front of him. She was smiling widely at him, her silver eyes locked onto his blue orbs. He hadn't noticed her coming to him.

"Oh, hey, Ruby! How's it going?" Jaune responded quickly, trying to cover up his surprise.

Luckily Ruby was as socially awkward as him, and didn't see it, "I'm doing alright. Just bored, I guess. Yang took Blake to run some errands, and Weiss is in the library, studying for Oobleck's test."

"Isn't that next week?" Jaune raised an eyebrow.

"It's Weiss." She deadpanned in return, getting a laugh out of him. She giggled alongside the knight, "Anyway, what are you up to? You kinda left all of a sudden after dinner."

"Nothing special; I practiced my swordplay outside, and now I'm not really doing anything." He told her smoothly.

Despite being a very close friend, Jaune didn't want to tell Ruby about his semblance just yet. He would keep it a secret for now. Speaking of which, why not use it on her?

"Oh! How about we play the new zombie survival game together? That way, we can both do something fun!"

And there was his opportunity. Jaune thanked the Two Brothers for Ruby's geekiness. Of course she would suggest something like that, though in this case, he didn't mind at all.

Jaune grinned, "Sure, I'd love to."

Setting up the game console in team RWBY's dorm proved to be less of a hassle than he expected. As it turned out, Yang and Ruby always kept their games close by; ready to fire it up. He figured the two sisters were the only ones who played. Weiss was too strict and focused on her school work, while Blake was the type to keep to herself and read her books.

Still, he was pleasantly surprised as Ruby pulled out the latest edition of a favorite franchise of his. He hadn't been able to buy it due to his training, but at least he had the opportunity to play the game now.

Though there wouldn't be much gaming involved in what was going to come next.

Jaune glanced at Ruby, who smiled happily as she turned on the console, turning her focus to the game. If there was something that he knew from personal experience, then it was that Ruby would be solely fixated on the screen.

After all, Weiss' chiding of the scythe-wielding team leader's addiction to games was something that had come up more than once at the dinner table, and right now, Jaune hoped he could use that to his own advantage.

"I'm going to take you down!" Ruby challenged him, looking up with her silver eyes filled with determination.

He grinned widely, "Bring it on!"

The game started shortly after, and the two teens began competing against each other, trying to survive the hordes of fictional monsters. It was easy to get immersed into the game, but Jaune's mind wasn't all into it.

Instead, he took subtle looks at the girl at his side.

Ruby Rose was young, but she was definitely attractive. While not as developed and beautiful as her older sister, there was no denying that she was pretty in her own right, looking cute with those red-tipped locks of black hair and captivating silver eyes.

And Jaune wouldn't lie; she had a nice figure. Again, she wasn't as buxom as her blonde-haired sister, but she was definitely more of a woman than Weiss when it came to physical appearance. It also helped that those black stockings were so tight around her toned thighs.

The young knight knew that his dorky friend and fellow team leader was incredibly pretty, and it made using his semblance even more fun now that he got the chance to turn it on her. With that in mind, he began his little plan.

Jaune sacrificed his chances on winning as he began focusing on the reaper next to him. His aura surged as his semblance was activated; a soft white glow appearing around Ruby, affecting her yet seemingly invisible except for him.

Now he was surprised. Was physical contact not necessary after all? Jaune discovered that simply focusing on someone close by was enough for his semblance to work, which would definitely come in handy!

"Haha, I'm winning!" Ruby cheered loudly; unaware of the changes happening to her body.

The petite girl's clothes began to fill out, becoming tighter in certain areas as Jaune grew her through the use of his semblance. Despite wearing material that concealed a lot, it failed to hide the subtle signs of defined muscles.

Her black sleeves began to display bulges around her upper arms; thicker triceps from beneath, while her biceps swelled larger. Ruby's arms grew by the second as more muscle mass was added. Her forearms followed suit, becoming thicker and meatier. Each time she pressed a button on her controller, her forearms would tense and inflate slightly, tendons tightening.

Jaune's eyes drifted over to her stockings-clad legs, which were now getting bigger and more defined, instead of just slightly toned. The soft fabric was stretched thin across her enlarged thighs; bulky quadriceps took form, and the young huntress' calves were like large heart-shaped rocks. From behind, her hamstrings grew thicker, and her cute butt became rounder and firmer as her glutes inflated.

It was difficult for Jaune to remain calm as he watched her become bigger and more muscular. Luckily for him, Ruby seemed to be oblivious to the transformation.

The growth affected her back and chest too, morphing them into tapestries of interwoven muscle fibers. Her tiny waist began to accommodate toned abdominals, which quickly turned into a solid six-pack. The girl's obliques joined in as they became defined, and had deep lines separating them. Much to Jaune's surprise, even her breasts grew; gaining another cup size.

Jaune deactivated his semblance after a few moments. By the looks of it, he was largely successful; Ruby had grown muscles all over her body, along with a few other changes that excited him, such as her enlarged bust and a bit of added height.

"Game over!" Ruby declared proudly, gaining the knight's attention.

The screen flashed as it displayed the end scores, of which Jaune's was much lower than hers. Still, Jaune didn't mourn his loss, for he -- or Ruby to be more precise -- had gained much more.

1112.content:
Their gaming session was suddenly interrupted as the door swiveled open, revealing the white-haired member of team RWBY. Weiss looked surprised by his presence, but was quick to piece things together. She sighed.

"Ruby, did you at least finish your homework before playing games?" There was no real bite to her voice; just resignation in case Ruby hadn't done what Weiss had asked of her.

"Pages seventy to eighty about Dust chemistry have been memorized, and I've written a report about the weak points of an Ursa." The reaper, who unbeknownst to her had become more muscular, responded as she rolled her eyes, "I've done my homework for today, Weiss."

The W of the team nodded courteously, "That's good. I'm glad to see you're working hard. And it's nice to see you, Arc."

"Same to you, Weiss." Jaune responded in kind, trying to not get on the shorter girl's nerves, "How did studying in the library go?"

"Oh, it went well. It's mostly empty this time of day, with a lot of the other students choosing to visit Vale or practice, while the upper years have their own classes. The peace and quiet was appreciated."

Yeah, probably because said peace and quiet was hard to find when you were part of teal RWBY. Between Yang's personality and the situations the team got themselves into all the time, he wasn't surprised Weiss chose the library as her relaxation spot. Blake was the only other member to visit the place, seeing as the girl had a habit of going to the adult section.

"Do you mind if we continue playing our games here?" Ruby asked.

Jaune smiled softly. It wasn't difficult to see that she was trying to be considerate with Weiss, who would probably want to continue working in silence. To his surprise, however, the heiress shook her head.

"No, not at all. You deserve to unwind a little, after all." Weiss smiled the tiniest bit, which was nothing more than the corners of her lips rising somewhat. Still, it was a genuine gesture from the ice princess, "I'll be reading my book in the meantime."

Ruby's grin grew wider as she replied excitedly, "Thanks, Weiss! Come on, Jaune. Let's play another round!"

"Ha, you're on!" He raised his controller and joined in on the fun.

However, his mind wasn't fully occupied by the game. Again. He thought of Weiss instead, glancing at the lithe girl sat on her bed, pale eyes focused on the heavy book in her hands.

It was no secret that he had had a small crush on Weiss earlier on in the semester. Aside from his cringy advances, Jaune had tried asking her out to the dance, only to get rejected. By now he knew she just wasn't interested, so he tried to be a good friend to her.

But that didn't mean he was no longer attracted to her. Jaune's crush had simply changed into admiration, appreciating the girl's grace and beauty from afar. So now that he had an opportunity to use his semblance on her, Jaune found himself prepping his aura and semblance discreetly.

Neither Ruby or Weiss noticed the white glow surrounding the heiress.

The process was similar to earlier. Foreign energy seeped into Weiss' lithe body, infusing her tendons and muscles and forcing them to grow. His semblance expanded its reach all over her form. Jaune's mind began to picture how he wanted to reshape her body.

Some of Weiss' most striking features were by no doubt her soft legs, so pale and smooth. They were incredibly alluring in those high heels of hers. He knew without a doubt they would look better with some muscle. So he began focusing on them in particular, pumping them full with aura.

Weiss' thighs broadened out a bit, hamstrings and quadriceps growing larger. It didn't take long for them to get toned up a bit, becoming visibly more defined. Small ridges and splits appeared in between the individual muscle groups. Similarly, her calves bulged and swelled. Not overly so; Weiss was graceful and delicate, and he wanted to keep her that way, so giving her a fitness girl physique seemed more appropriate.

Jaune pictured her waist in his mind, keeping it small but growing the girl's abdominals and obliques in proportion to it. Smooth muscle appeared underneath her dress in the form of a toned stomach. Each square was round with beautiful definition, making it seem as if Weiss worked her abs every morning before going to class. Jaune quite liked the image of the stern girl hunched over her books while exercising.

He gave her arms some extra mass as well. Again, not enough to make her seem bulky or anything, but to give her that fitness look that many girls on social media sported. If companies were aware of how fit and curvaceous Weiss' new muscles made her, they'd be lining up to have her sponsor their products by taking pictures of herself with said merchandise.

Eventually, Jaune arrived at her chest. Another fact that was hardly a secret nowadays, was that Weiss felt a bit insecure about her assets. It didn't help that Ruby -- the girls younger than her by at least two years -- was rocking a larger bust than her.

Deciding to be kind to the white-haired girl, he developed her chest muscles a bit more than the others. The breast growth was only minimal sadly, which was proof that Weiss was unfortunately cursed to have little natural cleavage, but Jaune remedied that by growing her pectorals. The twin slabs of meat gained several inches, creating a muscle cleavage instead. They pushed outwards against her dress, and when combined with the slight breast expansion she had gained at least a full cupsize; maybe even two.

Jaune disengaged for now. His semblance had done a good enough job on Weiss, turning her lithe body into a fitness model physique of excellent quality. The girl in question was still focused on her book, however, meaning she hadn't noticed.

"I win again!" Ruby cheered, causing him to jump slightly in surprise.

True enough, the screen was announcing his demise at the cute team leader's hands, "I guess so. Well played, Ruby."

"Please keep it down a little." Weiss spoke up, eyes flickering over to them, "I'm trying to read over here."

"Sorry, Weiss!"

"Say, Ruby? Have you by any chance been eating too many cookies again?" His latest victim inquired curiously.

Ruby frowned in apparent confusion, "No... Why do you ask?"

"I can't help but notice your stockings are filling out a bit more than usual. Your sleeves look tight as well." Weiss explained carefully. Jaune had a feeling he knew where this conversation was headed, "Don't you feel uncomfortable?"

"Well, now that you mention it... My clothes do feel a bit tighter than when I put them on this morning." Ruby put down her controller and stood up, inspecting herself more closely.

The dark-haired huntress in training rolled up her sleeve, recoiling in shock as her muscular arm was revealed; small veins standing out. Ruby's forearm was thick and shapely, but the same could be said for her bicep and tricep. Ruby involuntarily turned her wrist, causing the muscles to tense.

"Where did this come from?! I don't remember being so... big, when I woke up this morning!" Ruby panicked slightly.

Weiss stepped in quickly, "Calm down. Let's take a deep breath, okay? There has to be a logical explanation for this. Maybe your workouts with Yang caused this?"

"She has a point, Ruby." Jaune added, watching his friend settle down, "We're trying to become Hunters and Huntresses; it's only normal to be in good shape. And let's admit that Yang's workouts are a bit over the top."

"Okay, you've got a point there." Ruby relented. She rolled up her other sleeve and gave her arm a tentative flex, watching her bicep pop up like a round orange, "I suppose it's not too bad. And it'll make it easier to carry Crescent Rose around. But how did I not notice?"

Weiss huffed as she stood up and walked around, "See? You dolt; giving me a heart attack like that is-- why are you looking at me like that?"

"Um, you might want to check a mirror."

Jaune let out a sigh as the two members of team RWBY began a heated debate about their new sizes. Now, to be fair, he knew they would have found out sooner or later. At least his involvement in their growth was still kept secret.

Still, he couldn't help but admire what he saw. Both Ruby and Weiss were attractive, with the former being cute and the latter graceful, and their new muscles made them even sexier.

Ruby was definitely bigger than her partner. She was bulkier, though not by a large margin, and her muscles had more definition. Her shoulders were wider; the red hood covering her sinewy back.

As for Weiss, she was leaner than her leader. The muscle mass on her frame made up for her previous lack of curves, doing so in the shape of her firm butt and muscle cleavage, but also accentuating her slim waist and smooth belly.

"Girls, how about we let the matter rest for a while, and clear our heads." Jaune eventually spoke up, worming his way into the conversation. Luckily, his friends didn't seem to mind, "I think we just need to calm down. It's getting late anyway, and I don't think arguing over what might be happening will be very fruitful. Besides, we've got classes in the morning tomorrow."

That seemed to convince the two of them -- even Weiss. They nodded in agreement and did as he proposed. Once he'd said his goodbyes, Jaune left the room and returned to his own. He wasn't lying when he said they had classes tomorrow; he needed his rest to recharge his semblance.

Because there were bound to be more girls for him to bulk up.

The way her stockings hugged her toned legs, and her shirt curved around her generous bust made Jaune's heart skip a beat, "You look a lot happier than usual."

The spartan's kindness immediately loosened his lips. Pyrrha was the most supportive person in Beacon, who he could come to with any problems that he had, and receive nothing but kind words from. Honestly, Jaune didn't know what he would be without his friend's support.

There was also the fact that she was gorgeous. Hair as red as blood cascaded down her shoulders and surprisingly toned back, and eyes as green as emeralds stared at him with nothing but kindness. Her figure was similar to Yang's; still very feminine, but more toned and muscular, which was right up his alley.

"Well, I finally discovered my semblance!" His chest swelled with pride.

A large smile immediately blossomed on the invincible girl's face, "That's wonderful, Jaune! I'm so proud of you right now!"

"Thank, Pyr." He responded, using his affectionate nickname for the redhead.

Like usual, a small blush appeared on the teenager's cheeks. Come to think of it, Pyrrha only had those reactions around him. Huh... must be allergic or something.

"So what does it do?" Pyrrha asked innocently.

That was the question, wasn't it? Jaune debated whether or not to tell her, but ultimately he decided to just come clean. While it was definitely an unorthodox semblance, the blonde knight knew that Pyrrha would not judge him for it, and he could trust her with this knowledge.

And thus he told her everything he knew. The explanation didn't last long; he could grow any girl's muscles, maybe even help them more -- though he hadn't tested for anything like that -- and it required him to mentally will the person to grow.

Pyrrha listened attentively. It was probably a good thing to tell her all of this, seeing as she knew a lot more about aura and semblances than him. He'd been absent during one of miss Goodwitch's classes, which had covered the subjects, due to feeling ill at the time.

When he finally finished his explanation, his champion of a partner seemed to be impressed.

"Wow... That's certainly quite the extraordinary semblance that you've got there, Jaune." The way she spoke made it sound as if it was a big deal. Maybe it was, if Pyrrha was so certain about it, "It's definitely a supportive semblance. I don't see how it can be used in combat on enemies, but it would benefit your allies."

Jaune nodded, "I thought the same."

A half-truth, really. While yes, he did know that it could maybe give his teammates a boost during combat, his first thoughts were more about his fantasies that included powerful amazons.

He was just a teenager, alright?!

"Maybe you should ask miss Goodwitch for more help. If anyone would know more about this, it would be her." Pyrrha said with an apologetic smile, "Sorry for not being of more use to you."

"Don't talk like that, Pyrrha! You've been a great help so far when it comes to my training, and you're also the best friend I have -- don't tell Ruby, though." Jaune flashed her a bright smile, "I'm sure I discovered my semblance because of your help."

Now, even he knew that he was not the most observant person in the school. Jaune was dense; this was a stated fact that he knew all too well.

However, it was difficult not to notice the sudden glint in Pyrrha's eyes as she squirmed in her seat, rubbing her strong thighs against each other.

"Maybe there's another way I could be of help to you?" The red-haired Huntress-in-training spoke up hesitantly, "Say, what do you actually think of girls with... you know, muscles?"

"Ah... well, honestly? I think they look great." Jaune admitted reluctantly.

It was difficult to confess such a thing, but so far Pyrrha didn't seem to be disgusted with the idea. Besides, he knew that she could be trusted with his secret attraction to muscular women.

"I see..." Pyrrha looked away contemplatively. The champion fell silent, causing their conversation to take a somewhat awkward turn. Her green eyes then locked on to his blue ones, "Jaune, what do you think of testing your semblance on me?"

"Huh?!"

His partner gave him a sheepish yet determined look, "I mean, we want to know more about your semblance, right? Well, I think you should use it on me so we can properly see what it does."

Using his semblance -- the one that gave girls muscle -- on his partner; the beautiful and talented Pyrrha Nikos?

Was he in heaven?

"I guess so. Are you really sure about this, Pyrrha?" Jaune asked her, wanting to be sure that her mind was made up.

The red-haired spartan nodded firmly, "I am. Go ahead and use your semblance on me, Jaune."
